verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass in the eleventh<WH259> <WH6240> year,<WH8141> in the third<WH7992> month, in the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> speak<WH559> to Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and to his multitude;<WH1995> Whom<WH413> <WH4310> are you like<WH1819> in your greatness?<WH1433>

Behold,<WH2009> the Assyrian<WH804> was a cedar<WH730> in Lebanon<WH3844> with fair<WH3303> branches,<WH6057> and with a shadowing<WH6751> shroud,<WH2793> and of an high<WH1362> stature;<WH6967> and his top<WH6788> was among<WH996> the thick<WH5688> boughs.<WH5688>

The waters<WH4325> made him great,<WH1431> the deep<WH8415> set<WH7311> him up on high<WH7311> with her rivers<WH5104> running<WH1980> round<WH5439> about his plants,<WH4302> and sent<WH7971> her little<WH8585> rivers<WH8585> to all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of the field.<WH7704>

Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> his height<WH6967> was exalted<WH1361> above all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of the field,<WH7704> and his boughs<WH5634> were multiplied,<WH7235> and his branches<WH6288> became<WH748> long<WH748> because of the multitude<WH7227> of waters,<WH4325> when he shot<WH7971> forth.

All<WH3605> the fowls<WH5775> of heaven<WH8064> made their nests<WH7077> in his boughs,<WH5589> and under<WH8478> his branches<WH6288> did all<WH3605> the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> bring<WH3205> forth<WH3205> their young, and under his shadow<WH6738> dwelled<WH3427> all<WH3605> great<WH7227> nations.<WH1471>
Thus was he fair<WH3302> in his greatness,<WH1433> in the length<WH753> of his branches:<WH1808> for his root<WH8328> was by great<WH7227> waters.<WH4325>

The cedars<WH730> in the garden<WH1588> of God<WH430> could not hide<WH6004> him: the fir<WH1265> trees<WH6086> were not like his boughs,<WH5589> and the chestnut<WH6196> trees<WH6086> were not like<WH1819> his branches;<WH6288> nor any<WH3605> tree<WH6086> in the garden<WH1588> of God<WH430> was like<WH1819> to him in his beauty.<WH3308>

I have made him fair<WH3303> by the multitude<WH7230> of his branches:<WH1808> so that all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of Eden,<WH5731> that were in the garden<WH1588> of God,<WH430> envied<WH7065> him.

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because<WH3282> <WH834> you have lifted<WH1361> up yourself in height,<WH6967> and he has shot<WH7971> up his top<WH6788> among<WH996> the thick<WH5688> boughs,<WH5688> and his heart<WH3824> is lifted<WH7311> up in his height;<WH1363>

I have therefore delivered<WH5414> him into the hand<WH3027> of the mighty<WH410> one of the heathen;<WH1471> he shall surely deal<WH6213> with him: I have driven<WH1644> him out for his wickedness.<WH7562>

And strangers,<WH2114> the terrible<WH6184> of the nations,<WH1471> have cut<WH3772> him off, and have left<WH5203> him: on the mountains<WH2022> and in all<WH3605> the valleys<WH1516> his branches<WH1808> are fallen,<WH5307> and his boughs<WH6288> are broken<WH7665> by all<WH3605> the rivers<WH650> of the land;<WH776> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the earth<WH776> are gone<WH3381> down from his shadow,<WH6738> and have left<WH5203> him.
On his ruin<WH4658> shall all<WH3605> the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven<WH8064> remain,<WH7931> and all<WH3605> the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> shall be on his branches:<WH6288>

To the end<WH4616> that none<WH3808> of all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> by the waters<WH4325> exalt<WH1361> themselves for their height,<WH6967> neither<WH3808> shoot<WH5414> up their top<WH6788> among<WH413> the thick<WH5688> boughs,<WH5688> neither<WH3808> their trees<WH352> stand<WH5975> up in their height,<WH1363> all<WH3605> that drink<WH8354> water:<WH4325> for they are all<WH3605> delivered<WH5414> to death,<WH4194> to the nether<WH8482> parts of the earth,<WH776> in the middle<WH8432> of the children<WH1121> of men,<WH120> with them that go<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the pit.<WH953>

Thus said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> In the day<WH3117> when he went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the grave<WH7585> I caused a mourning:<WH56> I covered<WH3680> the deep<WH8415> for him, and I restrained<WH4513> the floods<WH5104> thereof, and the great<WH7227> waters<WH4325> were stayed:<WH3607> and I caused Lebanon<WH3844> to mourn<WH6937> for him, and all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> fainted<WH5969> for him.

I made the nations<WH1471> to shake<WH7493> at the sound<WH6963> of his fall,<WH4658> when I cast<WH3381> him down<WH3381> to hell<WH7585> with them that descend<WH3381> into the pit:<WH953> and all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of Eden,<WH5731> the choice<WH4005> and best<WH2896> of Lebanon,<WH3844> all<WH3605> that drink<WH8354> water,<WH4325> shall be comforted<WH5162> in the nether<WH8482> parts of the earth.<WH776>

They also<WH1571> went<WH3381> down<WH3381> into hell<WH7585> with him to them that be slain<WH2491> with the sword;<WH2719> and they that were his arm,<WH2220> that dwelled<WH3427> under his shadow<WH6738> in the middle<WH8432> of the heathen.<WH1471>

To whom<WH4310> are you thus<WH3602> like<WH1819> in glory<WH3519> and in greatness<WH1433> among the trees<WH6086> of Eden?<WH5731> yet shall you be brought<WH3381> down<WH3381> with the trees<WH6086> of Eden<WH5731> to the nether<WH8482> parts of the earth:<WH776> you shall lie<WH7901> in the middle<WH8432> of the uncircumcised<WH6189> with them that be slain<WH2491> by the sword.<WH2719> This<WH1931> is Pharaoh<WH6547> and all<WH3605> his multitude,<WH1995> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
